DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate image performance Dual Energy Digital Tomosynthesis ( DE-DT ) application commercially available predicate device .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation CARESTREAM Dual Energy Digital Tomosynthesis
DOC.detailed_description: The acquisition system consist use site equipment include CARESTREAM DRX-Evolution x-ray system , predicate CARESTREAM DRX Plus detector investigational DE-DT application . DE Study Design Thirty forty ( 30-40 ) patient receive DR standard care chest exam use DRX Plus detector DE exam . Each DE patient exam include high energy low energy image exposure use investigational device . These image use DE console software generate additional DE image ( e.g . bone soft tissue ) . DT Study Design Fifteen twenty ( 15-20 ) patient receive DR standard care chest exam use DRX Plus detector , DT exam . Each DT patient exam include scout image ( chest PA ) DT scan use investigational DT SW . The DT scan use DT console software generate tomographic image . 11 phantom various anatomy image linear tomography ( LT ) predicate DT investigational .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old . Subject provide informed consent . Study participant schedule chest CT exam . Study participant able stand still exams . Human subject specific : Not able willing provide Informed Consent , consent withdrawn . Study participant female child bear age .
